meals.portion_size: 1 cup cooked oatmeal, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tbsp sliced almonds

meals.dishes: Sweet potato hash with turkey sausage and spinach
meals.portion_size: 1 cup diced sweet potatoes, 2 turkey sausage links, 1 cup spinach
1 cup quinoa salad, 3 oz grilled chicken breast

meals.dishes: Sushi bowl with cauliflower rice, avocado, and chicken
meals.portion_size: 1 cup cauliflower rice, 1/2 avocado, 3 oz grilled chicken

meals.dishes: Salmon with quinoa and roasted vegetables
meals.portion_size: 4 oz grilled salmon, 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, 1 cup roasted vegetables (ex: bell peppers, zucchini, carrots)

meals.dishes: Beef stir-fry with broccoli and cauliflower rice
meals.portion_size: 4 oz beef strips, 1 cup broccoli, 1 cup cauliflower rice

snacks.portion_size: 1 cup bell pepper slices, 1/4 cup guacamole
